pull.title: BIP 0156: Remove transparent background from figures.

events.message:
Remove transparent background from figures

This increases contrast when reading on GitHub, if GitHub is switched
to dark theme.

events.body: ACK 0493ccbaa85ea4543c3ea52aada122340bda837d, appears to resolve an accessibility issue for users of darkmode. It seems to me that the content is not changed, but I would prefer to get consent from at least one of the authors.
Tested ACK 0493ccbaa85ea4543c3ea52aada122340bda837d it's easier to read in various light/dark mode configurations
